name: Wedding Crasher (Manuel Suarez, Chelo-94, DamiMDO, gecheverria, jereren)
name_original: Wedding Crasher (Manuel Suarez, Chelo-94, DamiMDO, gecheverria, jereren)
description:
Description

You stayed up too late playing videogames and when you wake up you realize that you'll be late for your wedding.  You must overcome obstacles and arrive before time runs out!

Te has quedado dormido por jugar videojuegos  y al despertar te das cuenta que llegarás tarde a tu boda. Deberás superar obstáculos y llegar antes que se acabe el tiempo! 

Controls:

PC

-Jump: Space/W/Up arrow

Andorid:

-Jump: Touch screen 

Gameplay:
